sentence.Network_en: Be assertive and spell out exactly how you feel.
sentence.Network_cn: 要自信点儿，把自己的感受讲清楚。

sentence.Network_en: Be assertive rather than bottle up your anger.
sentence.Network_cn: 要坚定自信，而不是把愤怒藏在心里。

sentence.Network_en: You should try and be more assertive.

entry.tran: 观点明确的；坚决主张的
entry.def: Someone who is assertive states their needs and opinions clearly, so that people take notice.

example.ex: Women have become more assertive in the past decade.
example.tran: 女性在过去十年中已变得更加自信。

means.word_mean: 1. inclined to bold and confident assertion; aggressively self-assured;

"pointing directly at a listener is an assertive act"

stems_affixes.word_buile: assert[v.断言,宣称;坚持;主张[权利,权威等]]+ive……的→adj.言语果断的,断言的
de离开+sert加入,插入,连接→不再加入→抛弃→沙漠[无连接,联系的地方]
insert[v.插入,嵌入;登载 n.插入物]+ion表名词→n.插入,插入物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 断言,宣称;坚持;主张[权利,权威等]

ex出,表示超出+sert加入,插入,连接→exert尽[力],努力
ex出+sert加入,插入,连接→插出去→突出

means.word_mean: 表现出刚毅与自信性格的;坚定而自信的;坚决主张的

sentences.en: Her son was an energetic, assertive boy, always ready to argue.
sentences.cn: 她的儿子是个精力充沛而意志坚定的孩子, 时刻准备着争论。
